h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: This enemy is built fairly tough, and can launch themselves high up to slice the air with their fan to create projectiles to slash your way.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Upper Pagoda (Level 4)'.
The content is as follows:
This enemy is built fairly tough, and can launch themselves high up to slice the air with their fan to create projectiles to slash your way.
